page.title: 12THE WITHINGTON ESTATE
page.content: { The Withington estate}is set in the centre of the village,Withington.It has been there 13 years,and consists of 1 bedroomed bungalows,and 2,3 or 4 bedroomed houses.Altogether there are 12 bungalows and 74 houses.It is an area of{high density population. The nearest shop where nearly everyone goes is a supermarket called {Norman's,}and the nearest pub called {Cross Keys}is 2 miles away. For the children there is a local school,brownies,boys brigade and a playing field. Other facilities include the milkman,postman,coalman,bus services and a mobile library,and in the village hall they have youth club,discos and bingo. Altogether this estate is in a pleasant area but it isn't safe for children as it's by a main road.
